scripts.stop:bg: sh -c "if [ -f bot.pid ]; then kill -TERM $(cat bot.pid) && rm -f bot.pid; else echo 'No bot.pid found'; fi"
scripts.restart:bg: sh -c "npm run stop:bg; npm run start:bg"
scripts.logs:bg: sh -c "if [ -f bot.log ]; then tail -f bot.log; else echo 'No bot.log found'; fi"
scripts.reload:bg: sh -c "if [ -f bot.pid ]; then kill -USR1 $(cat bot.pid); else echo 'No bot.pid found'; fi"
